channel.title: Need help with my pvp server! :D
channel.description: Hey, guys I have just made myself a pvp server by using a tut. But, when I try to attack another player in the wildy my level it says my level is too great. Can someone explain why it does that and how to fix it? /Thanks.

item.title: Need help with my pvp server! :D
item.dc:creator: @chrisrocks4122 chrisrocks4122
item.description:
@chrisrocks4122 wrote:

Ok, found it but what do I do with the coords? :S

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my pvp server! :D

item.title: Need help with my pvp server! :D
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Try searching for: isInWilderness.
Behind it there should be: (coordX, coordY, type)

Read full topic

item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Apply what i said in your server MAIN class. by default thats client.java

item.source: Need help with my pvp server! :D

item.title: Need help with my pvp server! :D
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

In client.java look for this:
if(AttackingOn > 0 && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) == true
And add this behind it:
&& isInWilderness(absX, absY, 2) == true

|| isInWilderness(absX, absY, 2) == true

After this:

isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) == true

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my pvp server! :D
